en: Birds are flying in the air.

en: Some birds are flying high in the sky.
zh: 一些鸟儿在天空中高飞。

en: The birds went across the sea.

en: The birds are singing.
zh: 鸟儿在唱歌。

en: The birds are flying around.

en: I found the cage empty.

en: Birds came flying by twos and threes.

en: When we reached the summit, we all yelled out into the void.

en: Can you see the snow-topped mountain?

en: That mountain whose top is covered with snow is the one that we climbed last summer.
zh: 那座山顶覆盖着积雪的山就是我们去年夏天爬的那座。

en: What is the name of the mountain whose top is covered with snow?

en: Look at the mountain whose top is covered with snow.

en: The rising sun seen from the top was beautiful.

en: Nagano beat Salt Lake City by 46 votes to 42.

en: When I visited my friend in Nagano, I was treated to delicious soba.

en: Long hair is out of fashion now.

en: Long cherished dreams don't always come true.

en: In his lengthy career, he had never seen the market so high.
zh: 在他漫长的职业生涯中，他从未见过市场如此之高。

en: Years of practice has enabled me to keep accounts without difficulty.
zh: 多年的练习使我能够毫不费力地记账。

en: My long cherished dream finally came true.

en: After being out in the wind and rain for years and years the walls of this apartment building are weather-beaten and brittle.
zh: 经过多年的风吹雨打，这栋公寓楼的墙壁已经饱经风霜，变得脆弱。

en: The walls of this apartment are weather-beaten after many years of wind and rain.
zh: 经过多年的风吹雨打，这栋公寓的墙壁已经饱经风霜。

en: Old habits die hard.

en: We had to sell the building because for years we operated it in the red.

zh: 多年来，我一直认为只有美才能赋予生命意义，而在这拥挤的地球上，一代又一代人所能承担的唯一目的就是时不时地产生一位艺术家。

en: After considerable argument, the buyer and the seller finally came to terms.

en: My first son was named after my uncle.

en: The eldest son succeeded to all the property.
zh: 长子继承了所有财产。

en: But he knew it couldn't last.
zh: 但他知道这不会长久。

en: It is said that the secret of long life is to have something to live for.

en: Live and learn.

en: The tall man looked at Tom and smiled.

en: Don't smoke if you want to live a long life.

en: Here's to a long and happy life!

en: We tend to slack off after many hours of hard work.

en: I will have been to Nagasaki three times if I go there again.

en: Nagasaki, where I was born, is a beautiful port city.

en: Mold grew on the boots.

en: The long walk gave him a good appetite.

en: The long-range forecast says we will have a mild winter.

en: I am not accustomed to walking long distances.

en: Deposits on long-term leases.

en: While long-term credit banks are authorized by law to issue bonds to raise fund, they are not allowed to take deposits the way ordinary banks are.
zh: 虽然长期信用银行经法律授权可以发行债券来筹集资金，但它们不允许像普通银行那样吸收存款。

en: Long practice enabled him to speak fluent English.

en: We called him to account for his long absence.

en: Working so long on the graveyard shift made his health suffer badly.

en: The governor invested him with full authority.

en: Because of the protracted depression, many workers are unemployed.

en: By dint of long practice he became most skillful.

en: She must be tired after a long walk.

en: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting for a long time.

en: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting for such a long time.

en: I feel hungry after a long walk.

en: I must apologize to you for not writing for so long.

en: Sorry to have kept you waiting so long.

zh: 他们长期过着奢侈的生活，现在他们无法适应没有奢侈品的简单生活。

en: The audience were mostly adolescents.

en: The audience was very large.

en: The audience were excited by the show.

en: The audience could hardly wait for the concert to begin.

en: Among the audience, there were teachers, lawyers, engineers, and so on.

en: The whole town knows of it.

en: The whole town was under water.
zh: 整个镇都被水淹没了。

en: I don't have any cavities.
zh: 我没有蛀牙。

en: He looks as if he could not even harm a fly.
zh: 他看起来好像连一只苍蝇都不会伤害。

en: Since I developed this cavity, my tooth has been really sensitive to heat and cold.
zh: 自从我长了这个蛀牙，我的牙齿对冷热非常敏感。

en: I had a feeling this might happen.
zh: 我就觉得可能会发生这种事。

en: The insect ate the peach hollow.
zh: 虫子把桃子蛀空了。

en: You should try not to scratch insect bites.
zh: 你应该尽量不要抓挠蚊虫叮咬处。

en: You should try not to scratch your insect bites.
zh: 你应该尽量不要抓挠蚊虫叮咬处。

en: Even a worm will turn.
zh: 兔子急了也咬人。

en: You're taking a lot for granted.
zh: 你把很多事情都当成理所当然了。

en: Even worms are bought for medical research.
zh: 即使是蚯蚓也会被购买用于医学研究。

en: The important point to note is that both parties offered similar solutions to this problem.
zh: 需要注意的重要一点是，双方都为这个问题提供了类似的解决方案。

en: We will deliver the products within 30 days after the date of Purchase Order.
zh: 我们将在采购订单日期后的30天内交货。

en: Indicate size, color, and style on the order form.
zh: 请在订单上注明尺寸、颜色和款式。

en: I confirmed the order.
zh: 我确认了订单。

en: Please cancel my order and send confirmation that this has been done.
zh: 请取消我的订单，并发送确认已取消的信息。

en: We can build speakers to order.
zh: 我们可以定制扬声器。

en: The items which you ordered arrived.
zh: 您订购的物品已送达。

en: All orders must be accompanied with cash.
zh: 所有订单必须以现金支付。

en: I received an item that I did not order.
zh: 我收到了我没有订购的物品。

en: I'll give you a shot.
zh: 我给你一次机会。

en: I tremble with fear at the thought of an injection.
zh: 一想到打针我就害怕得发抖。

en: Please listen carefully.
zh: 请仔细听。

en: A careful observation will show you the difference.
zh: 仔细观察会让你看到不同之处。

en: Look carefully, or you will miss Jane's mother.
zh: 仔细看，否则你会错过简的母亲。

en: If you look carefully, you'll find some insects.
zh: 如果你仔细看，你会发现一些昆虫。

en: Driving carefully, you'll be able to avoid accidents.
zh: 小心驾驶，你就能避免事故。

en: Careful as he was he made unexpected mistakes.
zh: 尽管他很小心，但他还是犯了意想不到的错误。

en: Careful as he was, he made an unexpected mistake.
zh: 尽管他很小心，但他还是犯了一个意想不到的错误。

en: Careful driving prevents accidents.
zh: 小心驾驶可以预防事故。

en: The more careful you are, the fewer mistakes you make.
zh: 你越小心，犯的错误就越少。

en: I was allowed to go off by myself provided that I promised to be careful.
zh: 我被允许独自离开，前提是我保证小心。

en: Watch carefully and you can see how my lips move in pronouncing the word.
zh: 仔细看，你就能看到我发音时嘴唇的动作。

en: This is the nth time I've told you to be careful.
zh: 这是我第n次告诉你要小心。

en: Be more careful. You often leave out some letter or other.
zh: 更小心点。你经常漏掉一些字母。

en: You've got to be careful or else you'll miss it again.
zh: 你必须小心，否则你会再次错过它。

en: You will hurt yourself if you're not careful.
zh: 如果你不小心，你会伤到自己。

en: If you don't look out, you will get into trouble.
zh: 如果你不注意，你会惹上麻烦。

en: Listen carefully, or you won't follow me.
zh: 仔细听，否则你跟不上我。

en: Unless you listen carefully, you'll be in trouble later.
zh: 除非你仔细听，否则你以后会有麻烦。

en: Read carefully, this book will do you good.
zh: 仔细阅读，这本书会对你有好处。

en: Some books, if read carelessly, will do more harm than good.
zh: 有些书，如果粗心阅读，弊大于利。

en: You can use my car as long as you drive it carefully.
zh: 只要你小心驾驶，就可以用我的车。

en: If you weren't careless, your word processor wouldn't break down.
zh: 如果你不粗心，你的文字处理器就不会坏了。

en: Answer my question carefully.
zh: 小心地回答我的问题。

en: We'll have to go about it with care.
zh: 我们必须小心谨慎地处理这件事。

en: There are enough accidents without asking for one.
zh: 已经够多事故了，不要自找麻烦。

en: The notes are at the bottom of the page.
zh: 笔记在页面的底部。

en: The pillar tilted to the right and fell.
zh: 柱子向右倾斜倒塌了。

en: If you work day and night, you will lose your health.
zh: 如果你日夜工作，你会失去健康的。

en: While napping, I had a strange dream.
zh: 午睡的时候，我做了一个奇怪的梦。

en: There are some people who sleep in the daytime and work at night.
zh: 有些人白天睡觉，晚上工作。

en: I'll fix a sandwich or something for your lunch.
zh: 我给你做个三明治或者别的什么当午饭。

en: Do you think you could make it before lunch?
zh: 你觉得你能在午饭前完成吗？

en: After lunch we have two more classes.
zh: 午饭后我们还有两节课。

en: Let's continue the game after lunch.
zh: 午饭后我们继续玩游戏吧。

en: Would after lunch be convenient for you?
zh: 午饭后你方便吗？

en: How about a cup of coffee after lunch?
zh: 午饭后喝杯咖啡怎么样？

en: I'm afraid I won't be able to make it for our luncheon appointment.
zh: 恐怕我不能赴我们的午餐约会了。

en: We asked ten people to the luncheon.
zh: 我们邀请了十个人参加午宴。

en: Let's eat lunch.
zh: 我们吃午饭吧。

en: I will go with you after I have eaten my lunch.
zh: 我吃完午饭后和你一起去。

en: Are you eating lunch?
zh: 你在吃午饭吗？

en: The phone rang when I was having lunch.
zh: 我吃午饭的时候电话响了。

en: Can we make a lunch date?
zh: 我们可以约个午饭吗？

en: We scarcely had time for lunch.
zh: 我们几乎没有时间吃午饭。

en: You've taken a long time eating lunch.
zh: 你吃午饭花了很长时间。

en: After she had lunch, she got ready to go out.
zh: 她吃了午饭后，就准备出门了。

en: Having finished lunch, we went skating.
zh: 吃完午饭后，我们去滑冰了。

en: You do not have to bring your lunch.
zh: 你不用带午饭。

en: Every person is expected to bring their own lunch.
zh: 每个人都要自己带午饭。

en: What shall we have for lunch?
zh: 我们午饭吃什么？

en: Lunch will be ready soon.
zh: 午饭很快就好了。

en: Where are you going to eat lunch?
zh: 你打算去哪里吃午饭？

en: This will have to do for lunch.
zh: 这个可以当午饭。

en: I don't want lunch.
zh: 我不想吃午饭。

en: Lunch is at 12:00 to coincide with the Technical Group.
zh: 午餐时间是12点，与技术小组的时间一致。

en: The lunch is on the table.
zh: 午饭在桌子上。

en: Lunch is ready.
zh: 午饭好了。

en: How about going for a walk after lunch?
zh: 午饭后去散步怎么样？

en: Is it too early to order from the luncheon menu?
zh: 现在点午餐菜单是不是太早了？

en: We have an hour's recess for lunch from twelve to one.
zh: 我们中午十二点到一点有一个小时的午休时间。

en: What do you want for lunch?
zh: 你午饭想吃什么？

en: Finishing lunch, he played tennis.
zh: 吃完午饭，他去打网球了。

en: The sun gives light by day, and the moon by night.
zh: 太阳在白天发光，月亮在夜晚发光。

en: Grandmother looks after the children during the day.
zh: 奶奶白天照顾孩子们。

en: My grandmother looks after the children during the daytime.
zh: 我奶奶白天照顾孩子们。

en: No stars are to be seen in the daytime.
zh: 白天看不到星星。

en: Do you offer any day tours?
zh: 你们提供一日游吗？

en: A friend of mine came to see me during the day.
zh: 我有个朋友白天来看我。

en: I have rather a busy afternoon in front of me.
zh: 我下午相当忙。

en: A lot of cars speed by on this expressway day and night.
zh: 这条高速公路上日夜都有很多汽车飞驰而过。

en: Let's have lunch!
zh: 我们去吃午饭吧！

en: Let's do lunch!
zh: 我们一起吃个午饭吧！

en: Do you think we'll reach his house before noon?
zh: 你觉得我们能在中午之前到达他家吗？

en: Night always follows day.
zh: 昼夜更替。

en: I have an appointment with him at noon.
zh: 我中午和他有个约会。

en: Day and night come alternately.
zh: 日夜交替。

en: Day alternates with night.
zh: 白天和黑夜交替出现。

en: How about going out for lunch?
zh: 出去吃午饭怎么样？

en: It may snow in the afternoon.
zh: 下午可能会下雪。

en: The days are growing longer.
zh: 白天越来越长了。

en: Some abstract art is difficult to understand.
zh: 有些抽象艺术很难理解。

en: Abstract art is something to feel.
zh: 抽象艺术是一种感觉。

en: Abstract art is not to the taste of everyone.
zh: 抽象艺术并非人人都喜欢。

en: We may give advice, but we do not inspire conduct.
zh: 我们可以提供建议，但我们不能激发行为。

en: Advice is like salt.
zh: 忠言如盐。

en: Good advice grates on the ear.
zh: 良药苦口。

en: The statue of Hachiko, the faithful dog, stands in front of Shibuya Station.
zh: 忠犬八公的雕像矗立在涩谷车站前。

en: I got sick riding the roller coaster with the loop-the-loop.
zh: 我坐了带环形道的过山车，结果生病了。

en: My comrades encouraged me to fulfill my ambitions.
zh: 我的同志们鼓励我实现我的抱负。

en: It seems to be my lot to be an odd man out.
zh: 我似乎注定要成为一个另类。

en: Join us, won't you?
zh: 加入我们吧，好吗？

en: A good mediator can make a deal go smoothly.
zh: 好的调解人可以使交易顺利进行。

en: In the company of good friends, the time flew by.
zh: 和好朋友在一起，时间过得真快。

en: A quarrel brought about the break.
zh: 一场争吵导致了决裂。

en: Some of the members of the middle class have fallen into poverty.
zh: 一些中产阶级成员已经陷入贫困。
